autorenew_service_update_modal_descripti: How often would you like to renew your {{ serviceName }} service?
autorenew_service_update_modal_automatic:
This service will automatically renew on the 1st of every month, from {{ expirationDate }}.
If you choose not to renew, disable auto-renewal before your service expires.
autorenew_service_update_modal_manual_re:
You have selected manual renewal for your {{ serviceName }} service.
Your service won’t automatically renew when it expires.
You’ll be reminded via email several times in the weeks and days before {{expirationDate}}.
To keep your service active, simply renew it before this date.
Important! Once the service expires, it will immediately be suspended, which means you’ll lose access to it. If the amount due isn’t settled after the expiration date, your data will be irretrievably deleted.
autorenew_service_update_modal_payment_m: You have selected automatic payment for your {{ serviceName }} service To use this renewal method, please enter a payment method in the “Payments Methods” section.
autorenew_service_update_modal_update_su: Renewal for the service has been updated. If the change does not appear in the list, please refresh the page.
